articles.title: Two-factor authentication
articles.subtitle: With two-factor authentication (2FA), you have to log in with your username and password and provide another form of authentication that only you know or have access to.

articles.title: Keeping your account and data secure
articles.subtitle: To protect your personal information, you should keep both your account on GitHub.com and any associated data secure.

articles.title: Troubleshooting SSH
articles.subtitle: When using SSH to connect and authenticate to GitHub, you may need to troubleshoot unexpected issues that may arise.

articles.title: Troubleshooting commit signature verification
articles.subtitle: You may need to troubleshoot unexpected issues that arise when signing commits locally for verification on GitHub.

options.title: Ask the community
options.subtitle: Ask questions, swap stories, share ideas on the community forum.

options.title: What's new
options.subtitle: Discover the latest authentication updates on our blog
